name: misbehavior
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
bad behavior, or behavior that breaks a rule: The school expelled him for persistent misbehavior. Congress must guard against any future corporate misbehavior. See
misbehave
More examplesFewer examplesWhat can a mother do to prevent misbehavior?Maybe you're just too tired to come up with new ways to deal with your child's misbehavior.The time is coming when theater chains will be forced to take action against audience misbehavior.
